FUNds

FUNds Forecast Model Updates

Learn about the changes and improvements made to the FUNds Forecast model over its various versions.

Version History

Version 5.0

Released: January 12, 2025

  • Split into TEMPLATE and EXAMPLE files
  • Bolstered guidance throughout
  • Support more recurrences, like every 3 months or every 90 days
  • Added custom formulas to simplify some inputs
  • Allow user inputs of cash redemption and average value of loyalty points inputs
  • Simplified loan and credit card payments into Recurring tab
  • Separated graphics into their own tab
  • Removed some un-used inputs/columns
